Articles.Content:
So i was unable to find an answer to a question i had awhile ago, regarding the kethane mod. I built a simple lander and was unable to to convert kethane into fuel no matter what i did. i have fuel lines running from the tank to the the converter as required. i also have plenty of kethane and electricity and yet nothing happens. I tried again today with a large converter that should (as i understand) extend heat distributors and then work. Well when i tested it today the heat things are not extending and still nothing is happening. Again i have plenty of electricity and kethane on board. WHAT AM I DOING WRONG!?!? Grr such a cool mod but i cant figure this out!

Help please!

Mo-T

Mo-t calm down! Please!

Did you attach a tank on top?

Got a LFO fuel tank?

Also did you download the .24 update post by taniwha here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/23979-Kethane-Pack-0-8-8-Rebalanced-converters-faster-scanning-and-0-24-compatibility?p=1313690&viewfull=1#post1313690
Thanks guys, i was able to get it to work with your advice.
